text: Heke hun qenciyan bikin, hun ji xwe ra qenciyan dikin, heke hun sikatiyan bikin, idi sixwa sikati ji bona we ra ne. Idi gava dane celata mayi hatiye; (we disa dest avetiye kirina sikatiyan, eme disa ewan bendeyen xwe yen xwurine, bi hez u zorbirhan, bi ser we da bisinin) ji bo ku ewan (disa) ruye we res bikin, ca di cara yekem da ketibune mizgevt u (welate we, hun bi kustin u zebuni, ji welat derxistibune) disa wusa bi sere we bikin; ji bo ku ewan rasti ci werin kavil bikin (ewan ji we tol hildane)
